annonstext:
About Nagarro

Established in 1996, Nagarro began as a dream of a few friends who wanted to create a company with a difference – a company that focused on “strategic differentiation via technology” initiatives rather than routine IT operations. Today we are more than 10,000 experts across 22 countries. Together we form the global services division of Munich-based Allgeier SE.

At Nagarro, you can look forward to a work culture that is dynamic and non-hierarchical. You will be given opportunities to add value to challenging and complex assignments, while collaborating with world class technologists. The versatile environment here, helps foster fresh perspectives and enables you to contribute in multiple ways. There will be ample opportunities provided for skill upgradation to accelerate your professional and personal development.

Senior Data Analyst

Nagarro is growing their business within in the Nordics and to the office in Stockholm we are now searching for a Senior Data Analyst who thrives within a consultant position where you get the chance to work with industry leading companies.

As a senior consultant you will be;

Responsible for data extraction, cleaning and building data analysis metrics system.Research the requirement for data analysis, establish data analysis framework system, output data analysis report and modeling report, etc.Selecting the most appropriate data mining algorithm according to business characteristics, and carry out data modeling, analysis and mining.Providing data analysis support for the client’s product and business development.Collaborating with the global Data/AI team to build up data service capability for Nordics region.

Personal traits

You are a hands-on person and a creative thinker who likes to come up with new ideas and solve problems. At Nagarro you will work with various technology/domain experts to adapt, develop and design winning solutions for the customers. You are able to work independently as well as cooperatively with a team.

Further on you have strong interpersonal, communication and relational skills, detail oriented, and a self-motivated person that takes initiatives. 

You are experienced in communicating effectively with users, other technical teams, and management to collect requirements, describe software product features, and technical designs. You are also able to handle concurrent tasks in multiple customer environments.

Experience and background

We believe that you have at least 5 years’ experience working as Data Analyst and that you are familiar with working with datasets in this domain, applying statistical analysis to these datasets. You are also experienced with data analysis methods such as cluster analysis, correlation analysis, test analysis, variance analysis, etc. as well as working with Descriptive and Predictive Analytics.

You have proficient experience in SQL and other structured query languages, R, Python and other statistical analysis tools or languages, and BI tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, etc.

Former experience from massive data mining projects with successful cases is a plus. Also if you have industry background of Manufacturing and Adobe Analytics or Google Analytics knowledge.

With your experience, you can understand the customers broadly from a business need and technical point of view and develop tailor-made solutions / offers based on this. 

You have a relevant IT education and given your interest within the area you keep up with new technologies and trends.

About the position

Full-timeStockholm, KistaStart asap

In this recruitment Nagarro Software AB is cooperating with AH Executives. If you have any questions regarding this position, please contact Recruitment Consultants;

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  EMAIL 

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  EMAIL 

We will present candidates ongoing to this position.

What Nagarro can offer

Individually adapted training Opportunity to explore and work in digital and emerging technologies An environment that is dynamic, collaborative, and non-hierarchicalCollaboration with other world class technologistsConstant skill upgrading through a comprehensive learning ecosystemHarnessing your technology consulting skills in a culture that promotes opportunities to provide thought leadership and innovative solutions for our clients
